title: Letters to My City
description: "Together we are alive in a city of destiny.I am still alive in Los Angeles!"The poems and essays in Letters to My City combine two decades of field experience, research, personal observations, and stories told to the author, a third-generation Los Angeles native, by his grandfather and other family members, to interrogate all sides of Los Angeles, its streets, its people, its neighborhoods, as a means to examine the postmodern metropolis.
author: Mike Sonksen
